chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Woman of Tanchico
chapters.info: Dena, p. 354 (282)—Woman who was an apprenticed to Thom Merrilin. She had long brown hair and dark eyes to match. She loved Thom, and Thom returned her love, despite the fact that he was old enough to be her father. She was killed by thugs in Cairhien who were trying to kill Thom and Dena due to Thom's supposed involvement in the Great Game.
